CustomField.description: This field controls whether to hide the Sales Process icon on the Dealmaker Launchpad in the Opportunity Detail screen (only relevant where users have a license to Sales Process). You may choose to hide this if you opt to add the Sales Process Launchpad Visualforce page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field controls whether to hide the Playbook icon on the Dealmaker Launchpad in the Opportunity Detail screen (only relevant where users have a license to Playbook). You may choose to hide this if you opt to add the Playbook Launchpad Visualforce page
CustomField.label: Hide Sales Process on Launchpad
